abstract: We determine the $N\to \infty$ asymptotics of the expected value of entanglement entropy in $H_{1,N}\otimes H_{2,N}$, where $H_{1,N}$ and $H_{2,N}$ are the spaces of holomorphic sections of the $N$-th tensor powers of hermitian ample line bundles on compact complex manifolds.
publication_venue: To appear in J. Korean Math. Soc
